source.8d3a7e1b:
from sklearn import preprocessing

# Replacing NaN with default valuesb
df = df.fillna(value = -1)

# Typecasting
df["carrier"] = df["carrier"].astype(str)
df["tailnum"] = df["tailnum"].astype(str)
df["origin"] = df["origin"].astype(str)
df["dest"] = df["dest"].astype(str)

# Initializing Encoder
number = preprocessing.LabelEncoder()

# Encoding
df["carrier"] = number.fit_transform(df["carrier"])
df["tailnum"] = number.fit_transform(df["tailnum"])
df["origin"] = number.fit_transform(df["origin"])
df["dest"] = number.fit_transform(df["dest"])

df.head()
